milestones.title: M0 Host
milestones.description: Initial production launch for guest play

issues.title: [M0] Epic: Host MVP (tracker)
issues.body:
Track the initial production launch for guest play. 

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] All M0 issues closed
- [ ] Public site live under custom domain
- [ ] Basic monitoring in place
- [ ] Shareable production URL posted in this issue

issues.title: [M0] Deploy frontend to Vercel
issues.body:
Connect repo to Vercel, configure build & output, enable previews.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Build command `npm run build` and output `dist/`
- [ ] Preview deployments on PRs enabled
- [ ] Production deployment from `main` succeeds
- [ ] Vercel project link added as a comment

issues.title: [M0] Configure custom domain via Cloudflare DNS
issues.body:
Buy/point domain, set DNS (CNAME/A) to Vercel, enforce HTTPS. 

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Domain resolves to the app (www + apex)
- [ ] Auto-HTTPS/redirects verified
- [ ] DNS records screenshot posted here

issues.title: [M0] Environment management & secrets
issues.body:
Standardize env vars for Vite (`VITE_*`), add `.env.example`, document setup.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] `.env.example` committed with placeholders
- [ ] Secrets stored in Vercel project/envs (no secrets in repo)
- [ ] README section “Environment setup” added

issues.title: [M0] Basic monitoring: Analytics + Error tracking
issues.body:
Add lightweight analytics (Plausible/PostHog) and Sentry for JS errors.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Pageviews visible in analytics
- [ ] Sentry DSN wired via env var
- [ ] Test error appears in Sentry dashboard
- [ ] Links to both dashboards posted

issues.title: [M0] SEO & robots: meta, Open Graph, robots.txt, sitemap
issues.body:
Add base SEO tags, social preview, `robots.txt`, `sitemap.xml`.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Title/description present and non-empty
- [ ] OG/Twitter card renders with image
- [ ] `robots.txt` & `sitemap.xml` available at site root

issues.title: [M0] Project hygiene: Labels, Milestones, Project board
issues.body:
Create standard labels, milestones (M0–M3), and a board (Backlog → In Progress → In Review → Done).

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Labels (`type:*`, `area:*`, `priority:*`, `status:blocked`) created
- [ ] Milestones M0–M3 created
- [ ] Project board URL posted here

issues.title: [M1] Mobile tap targets ≥ 44px
issues.body:
Ensure all interactive elements meet 44×44 px minimum. 

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Keypad buttons & controls meet 44×44 px
- [ ] Lighthouse “Tap targets” audit passes on mobile
- [ ] No clipped labels on narrow screens

issues.title: [M1] Viewport, safe-area, and `dvh` fixes
issues.body:
Add `viewport-fit=cover`, safe-area paddings, and use `dvh/ dvw` for toolbars.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Viewport meta present with `viewport-fit=cover`
- [ ] UI not obscured by notches/home indicators
- [ ] Keyboard show/hide doesn’t cause layout jumps

issues.title: [M1] Sticky bottom keypad + thumb-reach actions
issues.body:
Make keypad sticky at the bottom on phones; keep confirm/undo reachable.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Keypad stays visible when content scrolls
- [ ] Confirm/Clear/Undo reachable with right thumb
- [ ] No overlap with toasts/modals

issues.title: [M1] Keypad color tokens & disabled contrast (WCAG AA)
issues.body:
Replace opacity-only disabled styles with solid token (`--num- disabled`), ensure AA contrast.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Disabled numeric keys use solid color token
- [ ] Contrast AA verified for text/ labels
- [ ] Design tokens documented in CSS

issues.title: [M1] Accessibility pass (roles, focus, ARIA)
issues.body:
Add `:focus-visible` outlines, roles/labels, keyboard navigation.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] All interactive elements focusable & labeled
- [ ] Screen reader announces keypad & result updates
- [ ] Axe DevTools shows 0 serious issues

issues.title: [M1] Performance budget & code-split math engine
issues.body:
Define performance budgets; lazy-load heavy logic; keep TTI snappy.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Mobile Lighthouse Performance ≥ 90
- [ ] First load JS ≤ target (e.g., 150–200 KB gz)
- [ ] Code-splitting verified via network panel

issues.title: [M1] PWA: vite-plugin-pwa, manifest, service worker
issues.body:
Add installable PWA with icons, manifest, and basic SW caching.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] App installable (Add to Home Screen)
- [ ] Icons + theme/color set in manifest
- [ ] Offline shell loads (network offline)

issues.title: [M1] Offline “Puzzle of the Day” cache
issues.body:
Cache the daily puzzle payload for offline replay. 

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] First visit caches today’s puzzle
- [ ] Subsequent offline load shows cached puzzle
- [ ] Clear messaging when offline

issues.title: [M1] Haptics & micro-animations on “balance achieved”
issues.body:
Add subtle vibration (if supported) and animation when left==right.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Vibration API used when available (no errors elsewhere)
- [ ] Animation ≤ 400ms, does not block input
- [ ] Toggle in settings

issues.title: [M1] Lighthouse ≥ 90 across PWA/A11y/BP/SEO
issues.body:
Hit green scores on mobile Lighthouse for all categories. 

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Performance ≥ 90
- [ ] Accessibility ≥ 90
- [ ] Best Practices ≥ 90
- [ ] SEO ≥ 90
- [ ] Screenshot posted

issues.title: [M2] Supabase project & auth providers (Google, Apple, Email)
issues.body:
Create Supabase project; enable Google, Apple, magic link/OTP. 

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Providers enabled & tested
- [ ] Redirect URLs configured for prod/staging
- [ ] Supabase keys stored in env (Vercel)

issues.title: [M2] Database schema: profiles, puzzles, attempts (SQL migration)
issues.body:
Add schema and migrations for core tables.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] `profiles(id uuid pk, display_name, created_at)`
- [ ] `puzzles(id uuid pk, puzzle_date unique, digits, seed int null)`
- [ ] `attempts(id uuid pk, user_id uuid null, device_id uuid null, puzzle_id uuid, left_expr text, right_expr text, equal bool, duration_ms int, canonical_hash text, created_at timestamptz default now())`
- [ ] Unique index on (`puzzle_id`, `canonical_hash`)
- [ ] SQL migration file checked in

issues.title: [M2] Row-Level Security (RLS) policies
issues.body:
Enforce user-scoped access; allow guest device_id reads only for self.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] RLS enabled on `profiles`, `attempts`
- [ ] Authenticated users: CRUD only their rows
- [ ] Guests: read/write by `device_id` through a controlled RPC/edge endpoint
- [ ] Policy scripts checked in

issues.title: [M2] Edge Function: canonicalize & verify solution uniqueness
issues.body:
Server-side AST parse, normalize (commutative ordering, parens), evaluate equality, hash canonical string, upsert attempt. 

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] `canonical_hash = sha256(puzzle_id + canonical_string)`
- [ ] Unique constraint prevents dupes globally per puzzle
- [ ] Response returns `{ equal, is_new_unique, global_unique_count } `
- [ ] Unit tests for canonicalization edge cases

issues.title: [M2] Client auth UI + session handling (guest ↔ signed-in)
issues.body:
Add sign-in modal; preserve “Play as guest”; persist session; show avatar/menu.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Google/Apple/Email sign- in works
- [ ] Session persists across reloads
- [ ] Clear switch between guest and user
- [ ] Auth failures surfaced to user

issues.title: [M2] Submit attempts via Edge Function & show unique counts
issues.body:
Replace client-side evaluate with server call; display equality/uniqueness/global count.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Attempt sends `left_expr/right_expr/puzzle_id`
- [ ] UI renders equality + uniqueness + global count
- [ ] Errors handled gracefully (retry/toast)

issues.title: [M2] Migrate guest attempts to user on sign-in
issues.body:
On first login, link local `device_id` attempts to `user_id`. 

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Guest history appears after sign-in
- [ ] No duplicate attempts created
- [ ] One-time migration per device

issues.title: [M2] Player history & streaks (calendar heatmap)
issues.body:
Add profile page with solved days, streaks, best times. 

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Calendar heatmap shows solved days
- [ ] Streak count visible; resets correctly
- [ ] “View attempts” lists expressions & times

issues.title: [M2] Daily leaderboard (server-verified)
issues.body:
Materialized view or query for fastest solves per day; basic anti-cheat.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Leaderboard shows top N for selected date
- [ ] Only server-verified solves counted
- [ ] Ties handled deterministically

issues.title: [M2] Share results (copy-to-clipboard text)
issues.body:
One-click share that copies a compact text summary (digits, time, equality).

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] “Share” copies formatted text
- [ ] Works on desktop & mobile
- [ ] No PII included

issues.title: [M2] Legal: Terms & Privacy pages
issues.body:
Publish minimal Terms/Privacy (data collected, cookies, contact).

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] `/terms` and `/privacy` routes live
- [ ] Footer links present
- [ ] Last updated date shown

issues.title: [M3] CI: Lint, format, unit tests, typecheck, build
issues.body:
GitHub Actions workflow for `npm ci`, lint, format:check, `vitest`, `tsc`, build.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] CI green on PRs to `develop`/`main`
- [ ] Status checks required before merge
- [ ] Badge added to README

issues.title: [M3] E2E smoke test with Playwright
issues.body:
Script the core flow: load → input → solve → share copy. 

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Playwright runs in CI (headless)
- [ ] Test passes against preview URL
- [ ] Flakiness < 2% over 10 runs

issues.title: [M3] Staging environment & promotion flow
issues.body:
`develop` → staging (separate Supabase & env), manual promotion to `main`.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Staging URL and env vars configured
- [ ] Production promotion documented
- [ ] Supabase (staging vs prod) isolation verified

issues.title: [M3] Docs: README, CONTRIBUTING, PR template
issues.body:
Improve onboarding and review quality.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] README: stack, scripts, env, deploy, troubleshooting
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md with conventions & branching
- [ ] `.github/ PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` added

issues.title: [M3] Code ownership & dependabot
issues.body:
Add CODEOWNERS for review routing; enable Dependabot for npm updates.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] `CODEOWNERS` routes PRs correctly
- [ ] Dependabot PRs appear monthly/weekly
- [ ] Update policy documented
